page.title: 09WAR MEMORIAL
page.content: The War Memorial stands in the middle of a major road junction.It is made out of sandstone and has figures around the middle of it who are dressed in service uniforms.There is a lantern on top of it.There is a plaque on the side of the monument dedicated to the 266 people of Alnwick who gave their lives in the two world wars.These people have their names inscribed on the monument.Every Remembrance Sunday this memorial is the centre of the service of remembrance as civic leaders lay their wreaths and pay their respects to the dead.
